Course_Detail: Media and Entertainment is one of the most exciting and rapidly growing sectors, not just in India, but all over the world. According to the report published by FICCI, the Indian Media & Entertainment industry is projected to grow at a CAGR of 14 percent to reach US$ 28.1 billion (Rs. 1, 50, 00 crores) by 2015. For an industry that is growing at this phenomenal pace, there is a huge supply constraint in terms of trained managerial talent. The ever burgeoning media- be it print, radio, TV, films or the internet- is today constantly on the lookout for several lakhs of trained professionals to manage the show. School of management envisions transforming the students into real professionals in the field of media with leadership
